    public class GConsumer
extends org.apache.uima.collection.CasConsumer_ImplBase
    The class is the code-part of the Consumer component of the UIMA Framework. The class extends the CasConsumer_ImplBase.

    1.0
    Author:

      • getStartingIndex

        public int getStartingIndex(java.lang.String document,
                   int docIDOffset,
                   int spanBegin)
        Counts the number of non white spaces for the start index.
        Parameters:
        document - document where the span is found.
        docIDOffset - length of the document ID.
        spanBegin - offset of the beginning of the Named Entity
        Returns:
        Count of the number of non-white spaces for the beginning span.

      • getEndingIndex

        public int getEndingIndex(java.lang.String document,
                 int docIDLength,
                 int spanEnd)
        Counts the number of non white spaces for the end index.
        Parameters:
        document - document where the span is found.
        docIDLength - length of the document ID.
        spanEnd - offset of the end of the Named Entity
        Returns:
        Count of the number of non-white spaces for the end span.
